title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm
notes: Mirrors are black, like in normal wine. Has issue closing (freezes.) Did not test gameplay. Requires the following launch options: "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" The first launch will fail, the second will work fine.

title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm
notes: The models are invisible. Does not require "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" But the models are invisible

title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm
Life is Strange: Before the Storm
notes: Proton 3.7-5 Beta fixed the invisible models. PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% Is needed in launch paramaters or else the people will be invisible.

title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm
notes: Had to put "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" in Launch Properties, otherwise game wouldn't start. Game appears to work fine if this command is used, but their voices sound lower in pitch (like girls trying to do a mans voice)

title: Life is Strange: Before the Storm
